items.title: Meteorologists Say the National Weather Service Did Its Job in Texas
items.description: DOGE cut hundreds of jobs at the NWS, but experts who spoke to WIRED say the agency accurately predicted the state's weekend flood risk.

items.description: Bose’s stylish new midsize speaker brings clear and punchy sound to the party.

items.description: Adobe has launched a mobile Photoshop app for iPhone and Android. Here's what it offers.
